alert.note: Alert for Van Zandt (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 05 at 12:58AM CDT until April 05 at 1:30AM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: The National Weather Service in Fort Worth has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Van Zandt County in north central Texas... * Until 130 AM CDT. * At 1257 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 9 miles southeast of Canton, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Canton, Van and Edom. This includes Interstate 20 between mile markers 523 and 542. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 200 AM CDT for north central Texas. For your protection get inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows. Continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning can kill.
